amendment.description: To require a study on the deployment of members of the National Guard and Reserves in the global war on terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1471 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1471 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12590) To require a study on the deployment of members of the National Guard and Reserves in the global war on terrorism.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1471 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1471 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Vitter.
